text.hasBIMCoordination3D: The 3D Coordination process consists of using the Model in order to: Review, analyze Scope, and Make the Model compatible with other models provided by the client or other Stakeholders.
text.hasBIMExtracDocumentation: The Documentation Extraction process consists of generating DWG or PDF Projects from the Models.
text.hasBIMExtracQuantitative: The Quantitative Extraction process consists of extracting, from the model, the quantities related to the modeled items (or not).
text.hasBIMExtracVirtualMockup: The Virtual Model Creation process consists of using a software or application capable of generating: Photorealistic Images, Photorealistic Videos, Walkable Executables and Panoramic Views of the Model.
